entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %

Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: E 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
